Articles.Content: Been played KSP for over a year, recently joined the forum to find out tips, tricks, shipbuilding advice.

Well, you've come to the right place. As far as I know, everyone here has their own to share, so ask around, and learn. That's the ultimate goal of this game: to teach you something. Not that you won't have some fun on the way, note.

Welcome, and feel free to ask anything.... well, almost anything.
hello fellow Texan i am from northeast texas and hope that you have a great time with this game
Welcome aboard, txstyx. May your launches be explodey in the state of Mission Control!
